message: Let's start with a fair offer. I take most of the money, but you get a good starting point.
Let's split it in a way that I get a bit more, considering the inflation hits me less.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to take a bit less, but I need more than your last offer.
Considering the inflation, my share is still worth more than yours. I'll take a bit more, but you should hurry before it's worth even less to you.
